NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color> Clue: There is another QM locator on BH and two Nomai are debating which one is better
1
SOLANUM: Ilex, it is good to see you! You have my gratitude for being an extra set of eyes today during my pilgrimage to the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon.</color>
2
1
ILEX: Of course, my friend! I only hope you will be my set of eyes as well, when it is my turn!
3 2
ILEX: However, I am curious.. Was there a reason Bells instructed us to travel all the way to <color=lightblue>Ember Twin?</color>
4
3
ILEX: After all, there is a second <color=orange>Quantum Moon Locator</color> on Brittle Hollow, is there not? Could that one not have served the same purpose?
5
4
SOLANUM: That is a wise question.. I believe I may have even noticed it while visiting Bells earlier, but the thought never crossed my mind!
6
5
SOLANUM: I must return to the <color=orange>Gravity Cannon</color> on <color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</color> as soon as I can to begin preparations for my pilgrimage.. But perhaps you should ask Bells, if your curiosity burns!
7
6
SOLANUM: If I recall, the only projection wall on <color=lightblue>Ember Twin</color> is the one outside the <color=orange>High Energy Lab.</color>
8
7
SOLANUM: If you are able to find a projection stone that connects you to her, you should be able to use that projection wall to seek Bells, Ilex!
9
8
ILEX: I shall seek one then, while you complete your preparations! Be curious on your journey, my friend.
